Literature.Title: Computationally Designed AMPs with Antibacterial andAntibioﬁlm Activity against MDR Acinetobacter baumannii.
Literature.Author: Alsaab FM, Dean SN, Bobde SS, Ascoli GG, van Hoek ML

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:95% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:65% Hemolysis=10 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii AB5075(MIC=16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-1710(MIC=16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-1794(MIC=16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-1800(MIC=16µg/ml)
